Ryan Platte wrote:

> ~/src/junit-try $ java -cp . junit.textui.TestRunner
> com.example.namespace.TestTest
> Class not found "com.example.namespace.TestTest"

Where's JUnit on the classpath here? The -cp switch doesn't magically 
include your CLASSPATH environment variable. Maybe you want

-cp $CLASSPATH:.

When I ran it on my system with both JUnit and . in the classpath, it 
worked fine.
